properties.name: wikiverse.api.debug
properties.description: Enables verbose debug logging for the Wikiverse API service. Set to 'true' to activate detailed logs for development and troubleshooting.

properties.name: wikiverse.api.cache.enabled
properties.description: Controls whether the Wikiverse API caching mechanism is active. Set to 'true' to cache frequently accessed data for improved performance.

properties.name: wikiverse.api.rate-limit.enabled
properties.description: Enables or disables rate limiting for incoming API requests. Set to 'true' to restrict request rates and prevent abuse.

properties.name: wikiverse.api.rate-limit.requests-per-minute
properties.description: Specifies the maximum number of API requests allowed per minute per client. Used when rate limiting is enabled.

properties.name: wikiverse.api.logging.json-files.enabled
properties.description: Determines whether API request and response logs are written as JSON files. Set to 'true' to enable JSON file logging for audit or debugging.
